page.title: 14A Muslim Day B'ham
page.content: On a school day I get up at 7.30 and after a wash have my breakfast. At 8.20 my friend Shegufta calls for me and we walk to school. It takes 20 minutes. When we get there its time for registration and assembly. In assembly the teachers announce things and children do plays or sing. After the first two lessons we have a break when we can play games outside and buy sweets. There is one lesson before lunch. I go home for lunch and return to school to rehearse a Bengali dance. School ends at 15.30 and I go home for my tea. After tea I play or do my home -work. At 19.00 I read my Namaj and then I read Bengali books until 21.00 when we read Namaj again. Namaj is a prayer for Muslims. We read Namaj 5 times a day. Isha is the last prayer time. After I read my Isha Namaj I go to sleep.
